class.name: LayeredTileMapPattern
class.brief_description: Holds a pattern to be copied from or pasted into [LayeredTileMap]s.
class.description: This resource holds a set of cells to help bulk manipulations of [LayeredTileMap]. A pattern always start at the [code](0,0)[/code] coordinates and cannot have cells with negative coordinates.

method.name: empty
method.description: Returns whether the pattern is empty or not.

method.name: get_cell_alternative_tile
method.description: Returns the tile alternative ID of the cell at [param coords].

method.name: get_cell_atlas_coords
method.description: Returns the tile atlas coordinates ID of the cell at [param coords].

method.name: get_cell_source_id
method.description: Returns the tile source ID of the cell at [param coords].

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the size, in cells, of the pattern.

method.name: get_used_cells
method.description: Returns the list of used cell coordinates in the pattern.

method.name: has_cell
method.description: Returns whether the pattern has a tile at the given coordinates.

method.name: remove_cell
method.description: Remove the cell at the given coordinates.

method.name: set_cell
method.description: Sets the tile identifiers for the cell at coordinates [param coords]. See [method LayeredTileMap.set_cell].

method.name: set_size
method.description: Sets the size of the pattern.
